verbose_text: Surprisingly, it showed similar specific activities for aromatic, aliphatic and substituted aromatic carboxylic acids.19 For the reduction of aliphatic substrates the bacterial MmCAR from Mycobacterium marinum was utilized almost exclusively so far.8 To broaden our understanding of CARs within one phylogenetic category, one goal is to improve expression of TvCAR and to explore its characteristics and limitations in more depth.
